channel.title: AP News - US News
channel.description: Top US News stories from AP News

item.title: How US adults are using ‘buy now, pay later’ services, according to a new AP-NORC poll
item.description: A new poll finds the vast majority of U.S. adults are feeling some stress about the cost of groceries, as prices continue to rise and concerns about the impact of President Donald Trump’s tariffs remain widespread.

item.title: Texas governor threatens to remove Democrats who left state over Trump-backed redistricting
Trump attacks Charlamagne Tha God after radio host criticizes his presidency
